price: 51. Al-lah recompensará a todos según sus acciones. Ciertamente, Al-lah es rápido en la retribución de Su recompensa.
arabic: لِيَجۡزِيَ ٱللَّهُ كُلَّ نَفۡسٖ مَّا كَسَبَتۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: liyajziya al-lahu kulla nafsin mā kasabat inna al-laha sarīʿu al-ḥisābi
